summary: The inside story behind the Biggie and Tupac murder investigations is laid bare using police case files, taped confessions never before shown on film, and interviews with lead detective Greg Kading and other witnesses.
cast: Imari Williams|Greg Kading|Frank Alexander|Xavien T. Bailey|I. Elijah Baughman|Anthony D. Bell|Sean 'Diddy' Combs|Will Dunbar|Faith Evans|Vonn Harris|Kidada Jones|Quincy Jones|Marion 'Suge' Knight|Lil' Cease|M.C. Hammer|The Notorious B.I.G.|Cathy Scott|Tupac Shakur|Snoop Dogg|Shelayne Turner|Mike Tyson|Voletta Wallace
title: Murder Rap: Inside the Biggie and Tupac Murders
